author: holtdl
msg: Fix my previous fix. First time thru, I thought filepath was only used
with a <fileset> (oops). Changed passed-in file to be a string, so it
doesn't end up becoming a full-pathname prepended with the base dir,
which wasn't really needed and was complicating using it when a filepath
was specified. Also fixed some of the logging. (Also, hopefully the Java
is a bit better this time :)

author: bodewig
msg: Add pointer to Paul's record generating tasks.

author: stevel
msg: Javadocs for a lot (but not all) the Project methods. Also added a couple of explicit throws BuildException calls, even though by virtue of being a RuntimeException it aint compulsory.

author: stevel
msg: Jose Alberto Fernandez's prototype antlib/antjar code. This code lacks a build file of its own right now; it can drop in on top of build\classes.
